masters.title: Master's Degree Courses
masters.subtitle: University of Brescia • 2024-2026 • Current Weighted Average: 27.52/30 (63 CFU)

courses.name: Network Security
courses.description: Symmetric & public-key encryption (RSA, DH, CHACHA20, RC4, DES, 3DES, IDEA, AES, Blowfish), hash functions (MD5, SHA, HMAC, DS), cryptographic protocols (IPSec, SSL/TLS), network authentication (EAP, WEP, WPA, GSM, UMTS, LTE, 5G), PKI, VPN.

courses.name: Algebra for Codes
courses.description: Algebraic structures for error-correcting codes, coding theory fundamentals, and cryptographic applications.

courses.name: Business Strategy
courses.description: Mission definition, competitive and operational environment analysis, business and corporate strategies, marketing fundamentals.

courses.name: Information Systems & Web Project
courses.description: IT technologies, SIO (OLTP, ERP, CRM), SID (OLAP, BI, KPIs, CSFs). Web programming: client/server scripting, HTTP, HTML/CSS, XML, JSON, JS, JQuery, PHP/MySQL, AJAX, Web Services, Laravel, Eloquent ORM, API & SOA.

courses.name: Systems Administration
courses.description: System management across Windows, Apple, and Linux. Server services: BIND, Active Directory, Kerberos, Apache, Sendmail. Virtualization, cloud computing, and high-availability systems.

courses.name: Machine Learning & Data Mining
courses.description: Data mining and analysis, supervised algorithms (logic, structural, probabilistic, neural, geometric, ensemble methods), unsupervised learning (DBSCAN, K-means), NLP, Python applications.

courses.name: Modeling and Simulation
courses.description: Linearization & feedback linearization, system modeling, analysis & validation, grey-box/black-box/ARX models. Simulink and MATLAB applications.

courses.name: Scientific Computing
courses.description: Solving linear and nonlinear systems, approximation, interpolation, quadrature formulas, derivative approximation, solving ODEs. MATLAB implementation.

courses.name: Algorithms & Data Structures
courses.description: Asymptotic analysis, recurrence solving, sorting (comparison-based & linear-time), selection, heaps, hashing, trees, graphs (BFS/DFS, shortest paths), dynamic programming, Turing machines, undecidability, P vs NP, NP-completeness.

courses.name: Algebra and Geometry
courses.description: Correspondences, vector spaces, matrices, eigenvalues, bilinear, cubic and quadratic forms.

courses.name: General Electronics
courses.description: Diodes, BJT, MOS transistors, amplifiers, comparators, switches, bipolar and MOS logic families, logical design.

courses.name: Operating Systems & Computer Systems
courses.description: Mode switching, architecture, peripheral management, threads, scheduling, shared memory, deadlock, memory & file systems, block devices. Multiprocessors, UMA/NUMA/COMA architectures, client/server, middleware, clusters, storage, performance.

courses.name: Engineering Economics
courses.description: Business fundamentals, external accounting & financial statements, internal accounting & break-even analysis, ratios, financial instruments.

courses.name: Telecommunications Networks
courses.description: TCP/IP architecture; Layer 2 (Ethernet, PPP, Wi-Fi), Layer 3 (IP, ICMP, DHCP, ARP), Layer 4 (UDP, TCP, RTO), Layer 7 (DNS, HTTP, FTP, email).

courses.name: Probability and Statistics
courses.description: Conditional probability, discrete and continuous distributions, expectation, estimation theory.

courses.name: Physics II
courses.description: Electrostatics, magnetostatics, electromagnetic waves, and related phenomena.

courses.name: Telecommunications Regulations
courses.description: Broadcasting, telecommunications law, data communications regulations, standards, and patents.

courses.name: Programming Languages and Databases
courses.description: Programming languages: lexical analysis, BNF, operational & denotational semantics, Scheme, Haskell, Prolog. Databases: ER model, relational model, normalization, relational algebra, SQL, transactions, physical design.

courses.name: Artificial Language Technologies
courses.description: Compilers & Interpreters: lexical analysis, Lex, syntax analysis, Yacc, semantic analysis, intermediate code generation, P-code, code generation.

courses.name: Elements of Biology
courses.description: Biochemistry, biology, pathology, physiology, biological interfaces, biosensors, microscopy, harmonic oscillator, optical tweezers.

courses.name: Software Engineering
courses.description: Process models, finite-state machines, Petri nets, UML, use case analysis, design, testing/debugging, refactoring, design patterns.

courses.name: Advanced Java & C Programming
courses.description: Java: MVC architecture, GUI development, threads, network architecture. C: stack management, dynamic memory allocation.

courses.name: English
courses.description: Technical English for engineering communication.

courses.name: Computer Architecture
courses.description: Decoders, multiplexers, MIPS ISA, registers, Assembly programming, ALU, register file, CPU and memory operations.

courses.name: Computer Science Fundamentals
courses.description: C and Java programming, memory management, CPU architecture, peripherals.

courses.name: Mathematical Analysis I
courses.description: Continuity, differentiability, integration, function study, limits, series.

courses.name: Mathematical Analysis II & Operations Research
courses.description: Metric spaces, differential calculus, double integrals, calculus of variations. Linear programming, integer LP, graph theory, Gurobi optimization.

courses.name: Physics I
courses.description: Kinematics, dynamics, fluid dynamics, gravitation, thermodynamics, waves & oscillations.

courses.name: Automatic Control
courses.description: Systems theory, stability analysis, transfer functions, Bode and Nyquist plots, control systems analysis & synthesis.

courses.name: Chemistry
courses.description: Chemical bonds, reactions, states of matter, equilibrium, thermodynamics, chemical kinetics.
